entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:26 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 07:26 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
